titles.title: Hear, O Israel, The Lord Thy God Is One Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hear, O Israel, the Lord thy God is one Lord.
Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all of thy heart.
(Echo, starting on last word.)
Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all of thy soul. (Echo.)
Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all of thy mind. (Echo.)
Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all of thy strength. (Echo.)
